articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Songchongang Net-Weaving Factory and Plastic Tube Shop
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Songchongang Net-Weaving Factory and Plastic Tube Shop
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the Songchongang Net-weaving Factory and plastic tube shop of Enterprise No. 1521 of  the KPA. 
					 He looked round the mosaic depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He was pleased to see the mosaic erected by the officials and employees at their enterprise with profound reverence and the yard in front of it and its environment face-lifted.
					
					 He went round the newly arranged room dedicated to the history of the enterprise.
					
					 He said that the enterprise established under the far-reaching plan of the President made a great contribution to the development of the national economy under the loving care of Kim Jong Il in the past period.
					
					 Noting that the appearance of the net-weaving factory and plastic tube shop at the enterprise helps the enterprise emerge a general factory playing a big role in the building of a rich and powerful nation, he recollected the day he visited it last year.
					
					 Going round the net-weaving factory and plastic tube shop, he acquainted himself in detail with production there and management activities.
					
					 He highly praised the enterprise for waging a dynamic drive to keep the production going at a high rate at the modern factory and shop newly built under the leadership of the party.
					
					 He said that the factory and shop producing nets, ropes and plastic  tubes badly needed by various fields including the fruit growing, fishery industry and construction are the nation's precious assets, though they are not big in their scale.
					
					 Saying that the demands for nets, ropes and plastic tubes are on the daily increase, he instructed the enterprise to boost their production depending on the production foundation already laid.
					
					 "It is advisable for the factory and shop to improve the quality of products and their packing to be favored by the users and newly arrange a products show room," he said.
					
					 Going round the remodeled cultural hall, he asked how many seats it has and how it is being operated and appreciated its successful remodeling. 
					
					 Watching the visual aid materials displayed on the walls of the corridor of the hall, he underscored the need to effectively conduct the education of employees in various forms and by diverse methods and direct efforts to the education aimed to implant the anti-imperialist, anti-U.S. class consciousness into their minds as required by the prevailing situation, in particular.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, and Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C. the WPK, and Army Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the NDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Performance of KPA Art Squad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Performance of KPA Art Squad
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, guided the performance given by the art squad of the large-combined unit of KPA 324.
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers of diverse forms such as male chorus "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un Only", female solo "Voice of My Heart", poem recital "Marshal on Frontline", female sextet "Joy of the People" and trumpet and song "'I Know It,' Answer of Loyalty ".
					
					 The performers impressively represented the invincible might of the revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu grown to be matchlessly strong army under the leadership of the supreme commander and the ardent loyalty of the service personnel serving the army with longing to see him.
					
					 He said that the members of the art squad presented numbers of great ideological and educational values, expressing expectation and belief that the creators and artistes of the art squad would dynamically conduct revolutionary and militant performing activities in the future, too.
					
					 Noting art performances with strong influence and appeal are of weighty significance in the ideological education of the service personnel, he gave instructions which would serve as guidelines for the performing activities of the KPA.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Working-level Talks Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Working Talks Held
						
 Panmunjom, July 17 (KCNA) -- Working talks between the DPRK Olympic Committee and the organizing committee of the south side for the 17th Asian Games was held at Panmunjom Thursday as regards the issue of participation of players group and cheerleading squad of the DPRK in the games.
					 At the talks the DPRK side clarified once again its decision to send its players group and cheerleading squad to the games slated to take place in Inchon and advanced reasonable proposals concerning the scope of the players group and the cheerleading squad, their travel by air and overland and necessary transport means, sports matches and cheering activities, issue of their safety, communications and news coverage by DPRK media persons, etc.
					
					 It warned that the south side's act of politicizing the dispatch of the cheerleading group, spreading wild rumor that it is "a squad for political operation against the south" and it would create "conflict in the south" may seriously affect their  participation in the games.
					
					 The south side said it welcomed the DPRK's participation in the games, expressing the expectation that the current talks would be successfully held to settle all issues satisfactorily and smoothly.
					
					 It noted that the issues raised by the north side could be successfully solved in a positive manner through consultation at the talks as there was a precedent of the 14th Pusan Asian Games and the 22nd Taegu Universiad.
					
					 The south side which had responded to the proposal of the DPRK side at the morning talks as seen above made an abrupt U turn in the afternoon at the instruction of Chongwadae and took a challenging approach towards it.
					
					 The south side delayed 2 hours and 15 minutes the afternoon talks under the pretext of getting an instruction though it had been scheduled to resume at 2:00 p.m. After coming to the negotiating table so late, it made absurd assertions that "it is necessary to follow international practice" and "the scope of the delegation is too big", overturning all what it said at the morning talks. 
					
					 It took issue with the scope of the cheerleading squad and the size of the national flag of the DPRK, talking about "feelings in the south side" and claiming "it is hard to ensure personal safety." It went the lengths of disallowing even the big size not only of the national flag of the DPRK but also that of the Korean peninsula flag.
					
					 Afterwards, it went so mean as to talk about paying one's own expenses, after raising the issue of expenses for the players group and the cheerleading squad which the DPRK side has never mentioned.
					
					 When the DPRK side strongly accused the south side of behaving so ridiculously over the above-said issues, the south side remained tongue-tied and only repeated its unreasonable assertions, behaving more recklessly. 
					
					 The DPRK side branded such attitude of the south side as a deliberate act to bring the working talks to a rupture and prevent the DPRK from taking part in the games. It clarified that if the south side insists on such defiant attitude, it will fundamentally reexamine its participation in the games and that the issue of its participation in the games would entirely depend on the attitude of the south side.
					
					 Consequently, the hard-won north-south working talks failed to reach any agreement and broke down without setting the date for the next round of the talks due to the south side's unreasonable attitude and provocations.

articles.title: Delegation of Brazilian Communist Party Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Brazilian Communist Party Here
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Brazilian Communist Party headed by Raul Kroeff, member of its Central Committee, arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung by International Organization
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung by International Organization
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of laying a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung took place in the building of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on July 8, the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 Present at the ceremony were the secretary general and other members of the above-said organization and Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to Cuba, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait of the smiling President and paid tribute to him.
					
					 The secretary general said:
					
					 The Korean people could shake off the colonial yoke of the Japanese imperialism, build the independent and sovereign state, humble the arrogance of the U.S. and reliably defend the country's sovereignty as the President was born as the sun of the nation.
					
					 Through this event, I am convinced once again that the President is always alive in the hearts of not only the Korean people but the Cuban people and progressive humankind.
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for smashing the U.S. imperialists' moves and challenges, defending the sovereignty and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Wharf No. 3 of Rajin Port Goes Operational
articles.content:
Wharf No. 3 of Rajin Port Goes Operational
 Rason, July 18 (KCNA) -- Wharf No. 3 of Rajin Port has been built with success in the DPRK.
					 The building of the wharf pursuant to the plan for cooperation between the DPRK and Russia provided another foundation for making a positive contribution to boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and economic and trade relations among countries of Europe and Northeast Asia.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place in Rason City Friday.
					
					 Present there were Jon Kil Su, minister of Railways, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Also present there were Vladimir Yakunin, president of the Russian Railways Company, Yury Viktorovich Bochkarev, consul general of the Russian Federation in Chongjin, those concerned of railways and other Russian guests and staff members of foreign embassies in the DPRK.
					
					 Vladimir Yakunin in a speech said he was pleased with the completion of the wharf.
					
					 The wharf is capable of loading and unloading millions of tons of coal, he said, expressing belief that such joint work would not only develop the bilateral cooperation but promote friendship and mutual understanding between the two countries.
					
					 Jon Kil Su said in his speech that the successful reconstruction of the Rajin-Khasan railway section and the completion of Wharf No. 3 of Rajin Port are precious products of the vitality of the Moscow Declaration signed by leader Kim Jong Il and President V. V. Putin. He noted that the transport channel newly provided in the spirit of friendship and cooperation between the two peoples would satisfactorily play the role of a friendship bridge linking Europe and Northeast Asia and, through this, the international position of the Rason Economic and Trade Zone would be further enhanced.
					
					 Then followed congratulatory speeches.
					
					 A reception was given on the same day.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Youth and Students in Japan Meets Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Youth and Students in Japan Meets Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Korean youth and students in Japan led by Choe Il Gyong, department director of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, on Friday met with Ri Kong Sun, an indomitable pro-reunification patriotic fighter who is also a former unconverted long-term prisoner.
					 Ri Kong Sun said that he was unfazed with heavy penalties and appeasement for decades after being arrested by the enemy while struggling for the reunification of the country.
					
					 He said that he could defend his revolutionary faith as he cherished the deep trust in the party and the leader and the firm conviction of victory.
					
					 He expressed expectation that the members of the delegation would give a steady continuity to the patriotic lineage of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), remaining loyal to the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Ji Se and Un Song Hwi, members of the delegation, said that they were greatly encouraged by the mental world of the pro-reunification patriotic fighters who waged a staunch struggle with the absolute trust in the leader and the conviction of certain victory.
					
					 They expressed their determination to prepare themselves to be reliable pillars who will contribute to building a thriving socialist nation and developing Chongryon with the steadfast conviction and will that we are sure to win as led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An art performance was given by former unconverted long-term prisoners and their family members and members of the delegation.

articles.title: Swimming Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Swimming Encouraged in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- July and August are the months for maritime physical culture in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In the period, swimming pools, water parks and beaches across the country are crowded with citizens, schoolchildren in particular, every day.
					
					 Groups of schoolchildren are now seen at the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, the Munsu Water Park, the swimming pool of Changgwang Health Complex and other swimming and wading pools in Pyongyang.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA had interviews with those enjoying at the pools.
					
					 Choe Hi Dok, a teacher of Janghyon Primary School in Moranbong District, Pyongyang, said at the wading pool in Mangyongdae Amusement Park:
					
					 Any children in a maritime country should be good at swimming. So, all the pupils at my schools are now earnestly learning to swim.
					
					 Kim Son Hwa, a worker of the Pyongyang Essential Foodstuff Factory, said:
					
					 It's my routine to enjoy at the swimming pool of the factory after work. My daughter, a kindergartener, began learning how to swim at this pool.
					
					 At present, beaches in the east and west coastal areas, including Songdowon International Children's Camp, Majon and Ryongsupho, are packed with many schoolchildren and other citizens from different parts of the country.

articles.title: Chicken Soup Boiled with Ginseng, Traditional Korean Dish
articles.content:
Chicken Soup Boiled with Ginseng, Traditional Korean Dish
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have long taken various kinds of nutritious foods in midsummer to keep their health from sultriness.
					 One of them is chicken soup boiled with ginseng.
					
					 In this regard, Jo Tae Il, a researcher of the Folklore Institute under the Academy of Social Sciences in the DPRK, told KCNA:
					
					 The dish is cooked with medium-size hen and ginseng, jujube and glutinous rice put in it. It helps improve appetite and recover from anemia.
					
					 This soup tops the menu at local restaurants along with tangogi (dogmeat) soup in hot weather.

articles.title: U.S. Cannot Conceal Its Aggressive and Provocative Nature: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Cannot Conceal Its Aggressive and Provocative Nature: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. started the "drill for intercepting planes" on July 16 accompanied by naval maneuver in the South and East seas of Korea in league with the south Korean puppet forces. It was said that the U.S. will stage large-scale joint naval military drills in the waters near Jeju Island from July 22 with even naval warships of the Japanese aggressor forces involved.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 This is an open provocation against the army and people of the DPRK making sincere efforts to ease tensions on the Korean peninsula and create the atmosphere of peace there, and a very dangerous act of pushing the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 The U.S. is now running the whole gamut of gimmicks to conceal the provocative and aggressive nature of the war rackets kicked up by it. It is mobilizing reptile trumpeters to claim that the war rackets with the south Korean puppet forces are not problematic as they are "regular ones for defense". It is describing the U.S.-Japan-south Korea joint naval military drills as "humanitarian ones" aimed at search and rescue operations at the time of disaster.
					
					 But the world people clearly know that the U.S.-led military drills are aimed to deliberately escalate tensions on the Korean peninsula and that they are offensive attack drills for invading the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to defuse tensions and create the atmosphere of peace through dialogue and negotiations against confrontation of strength on the peninsula. The U.S. is trying to escalate the confrontation between the north and the south by throwing a wet blanket over such efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. war rackets are aimed to get versed in the methods for mounting a preemptive strike at the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in the moves for military threat against the DPRK, obsessed by anachronistic illusion, it will invite only disgrace and ruin.

articles.title: Halt to Suppression of Pro-Reunification Champions Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Suppression of Pro-Reunification Champions Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a statement on July 7 denouncing the south Korean authorities for cracking down on the organization for the reunification movement.
					 The statement condemned the repressive moves of the south Korean authorities against advisors, honorary chairman and other elders of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					
					 To suppress those weak for advanced age and diseases and impose ideological conversion upon them is a base and inhumane act reminiscent of that during the military dictatorial period, it charged.
					
					 It expressed concern over the undisguised and massive suppression of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon under the present regime.
					
					 No force on earth can block the Pomminryon's long journey for reunification, it said, urging the south Korean authorities to halt at once the suppression of pro-reunification champions and set free all the detainees.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Tighten Alliance for Aggression under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Tighten Alliance for Aggression under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 178th action for independent reunification and peace in Seoul.
					 The organization said that the operation sphere of THAAD to be deployed by the U.S. in south Korea is going beyond the boundary of the Korean peninsula. But the south Korean authorities are mulling joining in the U.S. missile defense system, mocking at the people with the lie that THAAD "is aimed to intercept missiles of the north", it added.
					
					 Meanwhile, the authorities are going to conclude a military agreement with Japan in the form of MOU with the U.S. involved, it said, adding this proves that the authorities are pushing forward again the conclusion of a military agreement with Japan, which was cancelled by the people's protest when the Lee Myung Bak regime attempted to do so in secrecy.
					
					 The organization demanded the authorities stop at once the moves to join in the MD for triangular military alliance and sign a military agreement with the U.S. and Japan.

articles.title: Defendant Praises DPRK at S. Korean Court
articles.content:
Defendant Praises DPRK at S. Korean Court
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A south Korean defendant shouted a slogan praising the DPRK at a trial, touching those present there, according to south Korean CBS on July 16.
					 He was detained on the charge that he posted an article praising the DPRK on his website in May 2011. He fully expressed his longing for the DPRK in defiance of several indictments and trials.
					
					 Much upset by this, the Chongju District Court held a trial again and sentenced him to a prison term. The moment he shouted at the top of his voice "Long live the great Democratic People's Republic of Korea!"

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Self-Righteous Personnel Policy Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Self-Righteous Personnel Policy Censured
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- An editorial critical of the south Korean chief executive's arrogant personnel policy was posted on Voice of People, a south Korean internet paper，on July 16. 
					 The present chief executive in south Korea designated Jong Song Gun with no qualifications as a candidate for the minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism and is insisting on his appointment, the editorial noted, and went on:
					
					 She is sticking to her self-righteous policy instead of seeking understanding and reflection. 
					
					 She shielded Jong who told a lie even at the confirmation hearing, sparking furor.
					
					 The second-term cabinet was formed due to the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 The cabinet should do its best, regarding the lesson taught by the ferry Sewol disaster as its administrative tasks. However, the new cabinet is little different from the old one as it brought Jong Hong Won back to his office and attempted to appoint Jong Song Gun.
					
					 The regime is infected with a "terminal cancer" as it depends on the confidants quite contrary to the people's demand for reflection and policy switchover.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Brutal Suppression of Teachers Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Brutal Suppression of Teachers Union
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Jongro Police Station in Seoul on July 15 searched internet website server of the Teachers Union, according to south Korean MBC.
					 The security authorities took this action on charges that teachers of the union posted on the website of Chongwadae several articles blaming the present chief executive for the ferry Sewol disaster and demanding her resignation.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Denounces Sycophantic Remarks of Chief Executive of South Korea
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Denounces Sycophantic Remarks of Chief Executive of South Korea 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A Korean in the U.S. released an article denouncing the chief executive of south Korea for her sycophantic remarks.
					 The article accused the chief executive of south Korea of crying out again for the "north's denuclearization."
					
					 She made reckless remarks pulling up the DPRK, asserting that the "north is insisting on the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts" and the "north keeps launching missiles and refuses to defuse the threat of nuclear test", an indication of her sycophantic disposition, the article said, adding:
					
					 She should awake from a daydream and behave herself, facing up to the reality
					
					 She should not do as dictated by the U.S. but implement the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Outpourings of Lawmaker from "Saenuri Party" Blasted
articles.content:
Outpourings of Lawmaker from "Saenuri Party" Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A member of the editorial board of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. released an article in denunciation of the reckless remarks made by a lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea who talked rubbish about "followers of the north".
					 The article said:
					
					 A lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party" let loose such invectives as claiming that Kim Ku was made a hero by the left-wing historians.
					
					 This guy had falsified the truth of the April 3 popular resistance on the Jeju Island and went the lengths of asserting that school youth and children were paid before staging candlelight rallies in protest against the ferry Sewol tragedy and some forces were behind them.
					
					 Whenever people held candlelight rallies against scandals, election fraud and fabrication of spy cases, these guys played the card accusing "followers of the north" in a bid to calm down the protestors.
					
					 It is a very wrong society that such guy who accuses even the former pro-reunification patriot of being a "follower of the north" is allowed to remain a lawmaker.

articles.title: Korean Writers and Artistes in Japan Meet
articles.content:
Korean Writers and Artistes in Japan Meet
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The 19th meeting of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan took place at the Korean Press Hall in Tokyo on June 30.
					 Attending it were Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kim Sang Il, its permanent member, Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the union, and other deputies.
					
					 Read out at the meeting was a congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the 23rd Congress of Chongryon. 
					
					 Kim Jong Su in his report recalled that during the period under review events for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and various literary and art events were successfully held and a lot of works powerfully encouraging compatriots in their patriotic movement were produced.
					
					  The general orientation of the work for the four years to come is to usher in a heyday in the field of literature and arts along with the new heyday of Chongryon as required by Kim Jong Un's era, he noted.
					
					 The attendants watched a video "Building flower garden of literature and arts across Japan." 
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 Kim Jong Su was reelected chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the union.
					
					 Pae Ik Ju in his speech called upon the writers and artistes of Chongryon to produce more new works praising the leader and the homeland and disseminate them among the compatriots and bring about a leap forward in the field of literature and arts for their happiness and future of the younger generation.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The meeting was followed by the first session of the 19th Central Committee of the union.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Japan
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting took place in Maebashi City, Gunma Prefecture, Japan under the sponsorship of the Japanese Gunma Society for Korean Studies on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants watched a Korean film dealing with his noble popular traits.
					
					 Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, said that the DPRK today would have been unthinkable without the faith of the President and the great succession by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President left his native home when he was 14 years old to embark upon the road of revolution and since then took the road of revolution in the deep forest and alien land, having no time even to drop in at his native home.
					
					 His life was one dedicated to the independence of people.
					
					 Whenever remembering the President who made total dedication to the people, my conviction in the Juche idea is getting stronger.
					
					 His desire was successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il and is being successfully accomplished by First Secretary Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The road of independence, Songun and socialism is the most proper way and the road for sure victory.
					
					 We will follow the road taken by Kim Il Sung all his life together with the Korean people and other progressive humankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, film shows and photo and book exhibitions were held in Russia, Poland, India and Guinea from July 4 to 6 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues of the events were portraits of the smiling President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there were photos documenting their immortal exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there were their works and photos and books introducing the army and people of the DPRK building a thriving nation.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Eternal Treasures in Praise of Sun".
					
					 The first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and other speakers praised the President as the prominent leader and outstanding political activist of the 20th century and benevolent father of all people who devoted himself to the country's prosperity, people's happiness and global independence all his life.
					
					 Though he passed away, his exploits for the Korean revolution and world revolution will be kept forever in the hearts of humankind, the first secretary stressed.
					
					 The chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army said that the august name of the President will shine as the eternal banner of victory in the history of human thought and the popular masses' struggle along with the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 Speakers including the general secretary of the Indian National Congress Party and the secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India lauded the President as the greatest man produced by humankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea and other speakers said that world progressive humankind reveres the President as his idea and exploits are great.

articles.title: Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Marked in Russia, Thailand
articles.content:
Month of Anti-U.S. Joint Struggle Marked in Russia, Thailand
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Russian and Thai organizations issued statements on June 26 and July 4 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of the anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said that after the Second World War the U.S. provoked the war against the DPRK to attain its strategic interests.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Though the U.S. hurled not only its aggressive forces but armies of its fifteen satellite countries, the south Korean puppet army and remnants of the Imperial Japanese Army to the war, it was compelled to sign the armistice agreement on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The Korean people's victory in the Korean War was a shining fruition of the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, brilliant commander and leader, a harmonious whole of the party, army and people and popular heroism.
					
					 The Korean People's Army developed into the strongest army equipped with modern weapons and equipment under the wise leadership of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said that the U.S. dream of nipping the young DPRK in the bud was utterly shattered by the army and people of the DPRK united close around the President 64 years ago.
					
					 The world will clearly see before long how the Korean people all out in the struggle to defend their sovereignty punish the provokers and emerge as the final victor, it noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Honestly Accept DPRK's Measures
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Honestly Accept DPRK's Measures
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Progressive organizations of Britain including the Britain-Korea Friendship Association expressed full support for the statement of the DPRK government on July 7.
					 In a joint statement they fully supported the statement of the DPRK government calling for putting an end to the confrontation between the north and the south of Korea and settling the issue of reunification in a peaceful way. The joint statement went on:
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is getting so extremely tense that even the slightest case may spark off a military conflict and bring disaster.
					
					In view of the gravity of the acute situation, the DPRK government took a bold and important measure for durable peace and improvement of the inter-Korean relations on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the last autograph left by President Kim Il Sung on the historic document related to reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should honestly implement the points agreed in the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, renounce their stance of relying on foreign forces and stop at once provocative war drills against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government indicates that it will take fresh measures and make sincere efforts for peaceful reunification of the country under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un in the future, too.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should positively and earnestly accept the just measures taken by the DPRK and make a positive response to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Red Songchongang y taller de tubo plastico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Red Songchongang y taller de tubo plastico
						
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Red Songchongang y el taller de tubo plastico de la Empresa no.1521 del EPC.
					Vio primero el mural de mosaico con imagenes sonrientes de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho de que los funcionarios y empleados hayan levantado con cortesia en la empresa el mural de mosaico y renovado el panorama del patio de educacion y el medioambiente.
					
					Estuvo tambien en la sala de presentacion del historial construida nuevamente.
					
					Dijo que la empresa, fundada segun el magno proyecto del Presidente Kim Il Sung, contribuyo mucho en el pasado al desarrollo de economia nacional bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Al ser construidos hasta la fabrica de red y el taller de tubo plastico en la empresa, esta adquirio el aspecto de combinado que desempena el papel importante en la construccion de una patria prospera, dijo recordando aquel dia del ano pasado en que la habia visitado.
					
					En su recorrido por la fabrica y el taller, se entero en detalles del estado de produccion y administracion.
					
					Evaluo altamente el hecho de que la empresa trabaja intensamente para normalizar la produccion en los nuevos establecimientos construidos bajo la direccion del partido.
					
					Aunque no tienen gran tamano, la fabrica y el taller, que producen redes, sogas y tuberia plastica necesarios a la fruticultura, la piscicultura, la construccion y otras, son valiosos patrimonios del pais, apunto.
					
					Se elevan cada dia las demandas sobre esos articulos y hay que producirlos en mayor cantidad utilizando la base de produccion ya preparada, instruyo.
					
					Hay que elevar mas la calidad de los productos y empaquetarlos bien para que obtengan visto bueno de los usuarios, dijo y recomendo acondicionar nuevamente la exhibicion de muestras.
					
					Pasando revista a la casa de cultura construida nuevamente, pregunto cuantos asientos hay y como la usan y evaluo el buen acondicionamiento de la misma.
					
					Al ver los materiales visuales exhibidos en el pasillo de la casa, dijo que se debe educar a los empleados de diferentes maneras y formas, en particular, prestar mucha atencion a la educacion para inculcarles la conciencia antiimperialista y la clasista y antiyanqui.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang, y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres, Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica de unidad combinada 324 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion artistica de unidad combinada 324 de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad combinada 324 del EPC.
					En la escena se pusieron el coro masculino "Fuerzas armadas revolucionarias apoyan solo la guia del Mariscal", el solo femenino "Voz de mi corazon", la recitacion de poesia "El Mariscal esta en el frente", el sexteto femenino "Jubilo del pueblo" y otras piezas.
					
					A traves de la funcion los ejecutantes demostraron con emocion el inagotable poderio del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu que bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo se ha convertido en el ejercito invencible y la ardiente alma de fidelidad de los oficiales y soldados del EPC quienes pasan los dias de servicio militar con la anoranza al Comandante Supremo.
					
					Los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica de la unidad combinada 324 del EPC hayan realizado la funcion con las obras de gran significacion ideo-educativa, senalo y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y los artistas del citado grupo desplegaran con vigor tambien en el futuro las revolucionarias y combativas actividades de propaganda artistica.
					
					Destaco que la propaganda artistica de gran influencia y caracter movilizativo tiene suma importancia en la educacion ideologica de los militares y dio instrucciones que serviran de guia en las actividades de grupos de propaganda artistica del EPC.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur
Phanmunjom, 17 de Julio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 17 en Phammunjom las conversaciones de trabajo entre el Comite Olimpico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el comite organizador de Juegos Asiaticos de la parte surena para discutir el tema de participacion del grupo de deportistas e hinchas de la parte nortena.
					En la ocasion la parte norte aviso otra vez la posicion de enviar el grupo de deportistas e  hinchas a los XVII Juegos Asiaticos a  efectuarse en Inchon y presento las propuestas racionales en cuanto a su tamano, las vias de ida y vuelta por via aerea y terrestre y los medios necesarios de transporte, la realizacion de los juegos y las actividades de hinchas, la seguridad personal, el aseguramiento de comunicaciones, las actividades de los reporteros de la parte norte y otros.
					
					Ademas, advirtio que la parte sur difunde erronea opinion publica sobre el envio del grupo de hinchas de la RPDC calificandolo de "grupo de trabajo politico en el Sur de Corea" y la "creacion de conflicto Sur-Sur", lo cual se puede dar la grave consecuencia a la participacion de la RPDC en estos juegos.
					
					La parte sur dio bienvenida a la participacion de la RPDC en los juegos y expreso la esperanza de que se realicen con exito las conversaciones de hoy para resolver satisfactoria y facilmente todos los asuntos de la agenda.
					
					Y senalo que se podra resolver positivamente a traves del acuerdo interno los asuntos presentados por la RPDC al tomar en consideracion los ejemplos anteriores de XIV Juegos Asiaticos de Pusan y la XXII Universiada Mundial de Taegu.
					
					Pero, por la tarde revolco toda su posicion y actuo provocativamente bajo la orden de Chongwadae.
					
					La parte sur aparecio a la mesa 2 horas y 15 minutos mas tarde que el tiempo previsto a las 14:00 y nego sus dichos en las conversaciones de la manana so pretexto de "costumbre  internacional" y diciendo que "es demasiado grande el tamano de la delegacion".
					
					Cuestiono el tamano del grupo de hinchas y la bandera nacional hablando del "sentimiento de la parte sur" y que "es dificil garantizar la seguridad personal" y exigio diciendo provocativamente que no es permisible la bandera de la RPDC ni la "bandera de reunificacion" de tamano grande.
					
					Al fin, presento el asunto de gastos del grupo de jugadores e hinchas de la parte norte de que no habiamos pronunciado ni una palabra y exigio que la parte nortena se cargue de todo.
					
					La parte norte cuestiono fuertemente el hecho de que la parte sur actua absurdamente diciendo del tamano del grupo de deportistas e hinchas, el asunto de gastos y la bandera nacional so pretexto de "costumbre internacional" y el reglamento de los juegos.
					
					Sin encontrar las palabras de respuesta la parte sur repitio solo sus insistencias ilogicas.
					
					La parte norte critico que la actitud de la parte sur es el acto intencional para fracasar las conversaciones de trabajo e impedir la participacion de la RPDC en los juegos y declaro que si la parte sur toma de continuo la posicion provocativa la RPDC reexaminara radicalmente su participacion en los juegos y la participacion o no en los juegos del grupo de la RPDC depende enteramente de la actitud de la parte sur.
					
					Como resultado, debido a las injustas actitudes y los actos provocativos de la parte sur, las conversaciones de trabajo Norte-Sur  efectuadas a duras penas fracasaron sin fijar ni siquiera el dia de conversaciones proximas sin lograr ningun acuerdo.

articles.title: Inaugurado desembarcadero no.3 de Puerto de Rajin
articles.content:
Inaugurado desembarcadero no.3 de Puerto de Rajin
Rason, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo construido el desembarcadero no.3 del Puerto de Rajin de acuerdo con el plan de cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Rusia.
					El desembarcadero hara gran aporte tanto a las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises como al desarrollo de las relaciones economicas y comerciales entre los paises europeos y del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en la ciudad de Rason la ceremonia inaugural.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro del Ferrocarril Jon Kil Su y otros funcionarios interesados y trabajadores de la ciudad de Rason.
					
					Ademas, participaron el presidente general de la Compania Anonima "Ferrocarril de Rusia" Vladimir Yakunin, el consul general de la Federacion Rusa acreditado en Chongjin, Yuri Viktorvich Bochkaryov y otros funcionarios interesados, asi como los huespedes rusos y miembros de las embajadas de varios paises en Corea.
					
					Vladimir Yakunin en su discurso expreso contento por haber inaugurado el desembarcadero.
					
					Destacando que el desembarcadero no.3 es el muelle capaz de cargar y descargar millones de toneladas de carbon, expuso su conviccion de que tal labor comun contribuira a desarrollar las cooperaciones bilaterales y promover la amistad y el interes mutuo entre los dos paises.
					
					El ministro coreano del Ferrocarril subrayo que la reconstruccion de la ferrovia Rajin-Jasan y la inauguracion del desembarcadero no.3 del Puerto de Rajin son producto precioso de la Declaracion de Moscu firmada por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el estimado Su Excelencia Presidente Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					
					La via de transporte nuevamente preparada gracias a la amistad y el espiritu de cooperacion de los pueblos de ambos paises cumplira satisfactoriamente con su papel de puente de amistad que enlaza Europa con el Nordeste Asiatico, a traves de lo cual se elevara mas el prestigio internacional de la Zona Economica y Comercial de Rason.
					
					Hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					El mismo dia, se ofrecio un banquete en honor de la ceremonia inaugural del desembarcadero.
